alert.note: Alert for Inland Sussex; Kent (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued September 23 at 7:55PM EDT until September 24 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM EDT SUNDAY... ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Tidal areas in the Delaware counties of Sussex and Kent. * WHEN...Until 9:00 PM Sunday. * IMPACTS...At this level, widespread roadway flooding occurs in coastal and bayside communities and along inland tidal waterways. Many roads become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional rounds of minor tidal flooding are possible into the new week. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Murderkill River at Bowers Beach MLLW Categories - Minor 6.6 ft, Moderate 7.6 ft, Major 8.6 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 0.9 ft, Moderate 1.9 ft, Major 2.9 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 24/05 AM 6.1 0.4 2.3 None 24/06 PM 7.1 1.4 1.8 Minor 25/06 AM 5.5 -0.2 1.4 None 25/07 PM 7.1 1.4 1.6 Minor 26/07 AM 6.0 0.3 1.6 None Delaware Bay at Lewes MLLW Categories - Minor 6.0 ft, Moderate 7.0 ft, Major 8.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 2.3 ft, Major 3.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 24/04 AM 5.3 0.7 1.8 None 24/05 PM 6.4 1.8 1.5 Minor 25/05 AM 4.7 0.0 1.0 None 25/06 PM 6.2 1.5 1.2 Minor 26/06 AM 5.6 1.0 1.5 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
